item.title: DefCon Radio
item.description:
Music for Hacking. The DEF CON Year-Round Channel. DEF CON is one of the world's largest annual hacker conventions, held every year in Las Vegas, Nevada. Since 2013, SomaFM has provided the music for the DEF CON Chill room.
Full article on: https://basspistol.com/highlights/2018/08/23/defconradio/
item.author: Soma.FM
item.itunes:author: Soma.FM
item.itunes:subtitle: Music for Hacking. The DEF CON Year-Round Channel. DEF CON is one of the world's largest annual hacker conventions, held every year in Las Vegas, Nevada. Since 2013, SomaFM has provided the music for the DEF CON Chill room.
item.itunes:summary: Music for Hacking. The DEF CON Year-Round Channel. DEF CON is one of the world's largest annual hacker conventions, held every year in Las Vegas, Nevada. Since 2013, SomaFM has provided the music for the DEF CON Chill room.

item.title: PinGNU
item.description:
PinGNU is a cybersoul banger of rank; a weird and wonderful mix between autotuned R'n'B, boombass and dope geekery. Blurring the lines of cooldom and cuteness, this track is a triptych love song addressed to all the FLOSS coder out there, in the Name of the GNU, The Pingu, and the Holy User.
Full article on: https://basspistol.com/highlights/2016/09/05/pingnu/
item.author: Sakrecoer
item.itunes:author: Sakrecoer
item.itunes:subtitle: PinGNU is a cybersoul banger of rank; a weird and wonderful mix between autotuned R'n'B, boombass and dope geekery. Blurring the lines of cooldom and cuteness, this track is a triptych love song addressed to all the FLOSS coder out there, in the Nam...
item.itunes:summary: PinGNU is a cybersoul banger of rank; a weird and wonderful mix between autotuned R'n'B, boombass and dope geekery. Blurring the lines of cooldom and cuteness, this track is a triptych love song addressed to all the FLOSS coder out there, in the Name of the GNU, The Pingu, and the Holy User.
